title: Internal Smart India Hackathon – 2022
description: An internal hackathon held to shortlist teams under software and hardware categories for Smart India Hackathon. A total of 56 teams participated.

title: Technical Talk on Latest Trends in Software Testing
participants: Students and faculty of Hindusthan Institute of Technology
description: A one-day technical session on 'Latest trends in software testing' by Mr. M. Sabarinathan, CEO of Gateway Software Solution.

title: Pitching Event for PoCs & Innovation Mentorship
description: Pitching event to link student PoC developers with Innovation Ambassadors for mentorship support.

title: Orientation Session on IIC 4.0 & Features
description: Orientation conducted to introduce features of IIC 4.0 by Mr. Dipak Kumar Sahu, Asst. Innovation Director, MHRD Innovation Cell.

title: Hindusthan Innovation Contest (HIC) – 2022
description: An innovation contest sponsored by AICTE under SPICES, aimed at promoting interests, creativity, and ethics. Chief Guest: Dr. Senthil Raja CS, Manager, Virtusa.

title: Problem Solving & Ideation Workshop
participants: Students of Hindusthan Institute of Technology
description: A workshop aimed at sparking innovation and creativity through problem-solving and ideation sessions.

title: Participation in Smart India Hackathon (Final)
participants: Team STARK from CSE, Hindusthan Institute of Technology
description: Team STARK from CSE participated in the Smart India Hackathon Grand Finale (software category) conducted by AICTE and MoE, Govt. of India. The team developed a web-based application for CVRDE Lab, Chennai (DRDO).

title: One Day Seminar on Career Development and Future Opportunities
participants: Students of Hindusthan Institute of Technology
description: A seminar was conducted on 'Career Development and Future Opportunities' to guide students in choosing their career paths. Keynote by Mr. Mohamed Salman, Co-Founder & CEO of Codilar Technologies.

title: Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive – 2022
participants: Students of Hindusthan Institute of Technology
description: Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive was conducted to promote entrepreneurial thinking among students, featuring successful startup founders and alumni entrepreneurs.
